page.title: 09HOMELIFE NETT'M KAREN
page.content:
One morning I woke at 7.00am.I woke my sister Donna,We went downstairs,there, Mum,Dad,Suzanne and Paul were waiting. After a breakfast of cornflakes,I brushed my teeth,and fed our rabbit Whiskey.Then I packed my schoolbag and walked there with Mum.In the playground I met all my friends.Work began at 9am,first Maths,then English. After a lunch of sandwiches and cake, School began at 1.15pm. We studied coastal features,after break came Athletics outside. At 3.30pm came home time.I played hide & seek and races with Claire Thorne. For tea I ate sausages,chips and ice cream.Then I watched T.V.,had a bath,and went to bed at 8.00pm.
Karen Ashcroft
